author.name: HL7 International - FHIR Infrastructure Work Group

description:
The SDC specification provides an infrastructure to standardize the capture and expanded use of patient-level data collected within an EHR.
This includes two components:
* Support more sophisticated questionnaire/form use-cases such as those needed for research, oncology, pathology and other clinical domains.
*Support pre-population and auto-population of EHR data into forms/questionnaires for uses outside direct clinical care (patient safety, adverse event reporting, public health reporting, etc.). (built Wed, Mar 27, 2019 07:27+1100+11:00)
name: hl7.fhir.uv.sdc
title: Structured Data Capture
